Jan 3, 2016

Dinosaurs ALIVE!

Posted in Family

 Discover the Dinosaurs! was such a hit for our family!

The entire exhibit was set up to be truly interactive and the life-size models were simply awesome! We walked through completely immersed in each scene as the brachiosaurus and T-Rex roared and leaned toward us! Noah, our resident 9-year old soaked up the interactive controllers where he could manipulate each gargantuan model to move and roar! A ride on Stegosaurus and keep-your-find fossil dig wrapped the day for us!!

Definitely gets this mommy's seal of approval!!

Click the link above to get tickets in your area!

xoxo,

jen@mommyknowsbest.co
